Package shapes

Class Cone

java.lang.Object
shapes.Shape
shapes.Cone
public class Cone extends Shape
Cone.java Class Definition: Represents a cone shape. Extends the Shape class and provides methods to calculate its volume and base area.

    • Cone

      public Cone(double height, double radius)
      Constructor method to create a new Cone object. Precondition: None. Postcondition: The Cone object is created with the specified height and radius.

      height - the height value of the cone.
      radius - the radius value of the cone.
